biotools.summary:
ChEMBL-Likeness Score and Database GDBChEMBL.

GDBChEMBL is a library of 10 million chemical structures that was extracted from the exhaustively generated database GDB17. It was generated by scoring input SMILES structures by circular substructures shared with the reference database of known chemical compounds, ChEMBL v.24.
